poster.username: why did i make a nhentai acc?

body: Finally another one of this series, i was hoping for kirito instead of shinon, but still this is awesome and thanks for the info @skatlads15
Checked author's twitter, he's already announced the Kiriko sequel

Could we not get some more wholesome sinon content ;(
This obviously has it audience which isnt a problem but more other sinon content would be great.
Also I would have found the the Kirito gender bender arc more interesting, maybe they would all get together in a twisted way at the end, which would still kinda better than this.
